scripts.sub-yaml: jq '.[]|select(.chainName=="${NETWORK:-mumbai}")' config/networks.json | npx hbs-cli -i subgraph.yaml_handlebar -e yaml -o thegraph
scripts.sub--build: npm run sub-yaml && npm run sub-codegen && npm run sub-graph-build
scripts.sub-predeploy: npm run sub-clean && npm run sub-yaml && npm run sub-codegen && npm run sub-build && npm run sub-check
scripts.sub-deploy: npm run sub-predeploy && cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-${NETWORK:-mumbai} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $THEGRAPH_KEY
